SIGNUP.SUBTITLE: You can now add your city!

SIGNUP.CREATING_ACC_INFO: Manage your city's structure, by creating an account at sense.city platform
SIGNUP.CHOOSING_MAIN_DEPARTMENT: Your city is initiated with a main issues department. For further issue assignment in the corresponding departments, you should provide them in city administration platform.

SIGNUP.CITY_EXISTS_ERR: Your city is already registered in platform

DASHBOARD.USERS_DESC: Create and edit users that manage city's issues
DASHBOARD.DEP_DESC: Create and edit departments that manage city's issues
DASHBOARD.RESET_PASSWORD_MSG: A new password was sent at
DASHBOARD.DEPARTMENT_ADD_INFO:
Ιnformation
  • Users with the 'Issues Administrator' role are preselected as issue administrators of each department.
  • It is not possible to select a 'Department User' if he is assigned to another department. A change is of role is required possibly.
  • Someone of issue administrators is selected as department 'Manager'. In case of new issues reported, is also notified via email.
  • Select among city users, who are 'also notified' via email.
DASHBOARD.DEPARTMENT_EDIT_INFO:
Ιnformation
  • Department name, manager and notification list editing service is not yet available!
  • Users with the 'Issues Administrator' role are preselected as issue administrators of each department.
  • It is not possible to select a 'Department User' if he is assigned to another department. A change is of role is required possibly.
  • Someone of issue administrators is selected as department 'Manager'. In case of new issues reported, is also notified via email.
  • Select among city users, who are 'also notified' via email.
